law.text: Whenever a person has been committed to the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene under § 3-112 of this article for a crime of violence and a victim of the crime or a victim's representative has submitted a written request to the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene for notification or submitted a notification request form under § 11-104 of this title, the victim or victim's representative has the rights provided under § 3-123 of this article.
